problem.description: ### Sum of Even Numbers Given an array of integers, return the sum of all even numbers in the array.  #### Input Format - First line: N (number of elements)   - Second line: N space-separated integers #### Output Format - A single integer — the sum of even numbers #### Constraints - 1 ≤ N ≤ 10^5   - -10^9 ≤ arr[i] ≤ 10^9 #### Example **Input** ``` 5 1 2 3 4 5 ``` **Output** ``` 6 ```
